document.full_text: japan will repatriate more funds than markets expect to finance its reconstruction efforts following its devastating earthquake and tsunami, the co-chief investment officer of top bond fund pimco said on thursday.
document.title: japan fund repatriation to top views: pimco
lines_and_colors: japan will repatriate more funds than markets expect to finance its reconstruction efforts following its devastating earthquake and tsunami, the co-chief investment officer of top bond fund pimco said on thursday.
